paragraphs.text: Due to the anarchy in the Earth Kingdom, the position of the Grand Secretariat was rendered effectively meaningless by 174 AG, since there was no reigning government. Despite that, the Grand Secretariat and the royal cabinet still maintained the power to crown a monarch. After Kuvira's defeat following her attack on Republic City, King Wu announced his desire to abolish the monarchy in favor of independent states with a democratically elected government, which would make the position of the Grand Secretariat obsolete, as there would no longer be a central government.
